repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Transcript of proceedings and exhibits of the Emergency Board No. 125. Equal pay case. Pan American World Airways, Inc. vs. Transport Workers Union of America, Air Transport Division, 1946-1959.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: U.S. Emergency Board No. 125 Records #5051. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials

controlaccess.subject: Airlines -- Employees -- Labor unions -- United States -- Sources
Arbitration, Industrial -- United States -- Sources

did.unittitle: Average age of flight service personnel by sex and classification as of April 1, 1959.
Distribution on pay scale and weighted averages of flight service personnel as of April 1, 1959.
Summary of hours over 70 per month and dollars paid for 1956, 1957 and 1958 flight service personnel.
Average monthly weighted average "earnings" for PAA flight service employees including hours over 70, 255 and 900.
Comparison of PAA and selected airlines ratio of international revenue ton miles to total revenue ton miles for year 1958.
Comparison of PAA flight service scales with flight service scales of selected airlines as of April 30, 1959.
Comparison of premium and overtime pay factors other than base pay for PAA flight service personnel and selected airlines as of April 1, 1959.
